name: autoproject-playwright
description: Automated testing with Playwright and TypeScript

scripts.test:dev-staging:qase: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false npx playwright test --project=scheduling
scripts.test:dev-staging:qase:ci: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false npx playwright test --project=$PROJECT
scripts.test:dev-staging:local: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=report npx playwright test --project=scheduling
scripts.test:preprod:with-storage: cross-env ENV=pre-prod SFDX_ALIAS=mypre-product npx playwright test --project=scheduling
scripts.test:preprod:scheduling:alias: cross-env ENV=pre-prod SFDX_ALIAS=trungpre-product npx playwright test --project=scheduling
scripts.test:preprod:qase: cross-env ENV=pre-prod QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=true npx playwright test --project=scheduling
scripts.test:regression:qase: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false npx playwright test --project=scheduling --grep @Regression --headless=false
scripts.test:dev-staging:qase:attach: cross-env ENV=dev-staging QASE_MODE=testops QASE_TESTOPS_RUN_ID=$RUN_ID QASE_TESTOPS_API_HOST=qase.io QASE_CAPTURE_LOGS=false QASE_TESTOPS_RUN_COMPLETE=false npx playwright test --project=scheduling
